channel.title: untagged on Nacho González

item.title: About me
item.description: Hi! My name is José Ignacio González Cárdenas. Everybody calls me Nacho. I’m a software engineer based in Guadalajara, México. I’ve worked primarily with services written in Go. I have experience with fast, distributed, fault-tolerant systems. I was invited to participate as a speaker a couple of times in local Go meetups. Traveling is one of my main passions. I’ve travelled through Mexico, Central Europe and some parts of the US.
